channel.title: Error loading
channel.description:
please help me when i run the run.bat on client folder i get this error
PANIC! RANDOMISED BLOCK! java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8 at Class13.method227(Class13.java:241) at Class13.method225(Class13.java:27) at StreamLoader.(StreamLoader.java:21) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:3691) at client.startUp(client.java:7578) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:4933) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: loaderror Connecting to fileserver 10
